sentence: Only had a couple of negative experiences which is why I did not give it a 5 star
The shower had two settings warm and trickling or hot and blasting
wifi was free with an attempt at premium upsel and the sheets are changed every 2 days because of the overwhelming concern for the environment by the management
The Hyat Fairfax is the worst hotel experience we have ever had
Worse hotel experience
We are not the kind of people that typically complain formally or post reviews and create a public issue of our experience but this experience was awful
The hotel is a no smoking environment which I like there was a patron standing in the middle of the front steps smoking cigarettes and the smoke was coming in the lobby of the hotel it was horrible
Overall acceptable experience we decided we had try other locations in the area next time we have to stay the weekend
Lots of people at the front desk with complaints about the hotel claiming to have amenities it did not but we did not have that experience
But I would be mad if I was a guest who had paid full price expecting a four star experience with so many other options at a better price in the area
The hotel lobby had sophisticated decor and since was during holidays it was beautifulying decorated with festive decor
We just checked in and it has been a great experience here
We loved the modern ambience and cleaniles
Wonderful experience up to date clean hotel
It was a nice experience and I recommend my friends and family to choose this hotel for their stay
The checkin experience was easy and pleasant
Had an amazing experience at the Hyat will stay again
The room setting was nice and comfortable and the king size bed was nicely made with soft linens during my stay
I had a nice experience and woke feeling refreshed
Love it that it ’s pet friendly and it has two patios to sit and enjoy with the dogs and has a lot of grass in the surroundings
